scripts.cypress:run:edge: cross-env E2E_ENV=.dev BROWSER_TYPE=desktop RESOLUTION=1536x864 cypress run --browser edge
scripts.cypress:run:firefox: cross-env E2E_ENV=.dev BROWSER_TYPE=tablet RESOLUTION=800x1280 cypress run --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:run:chrome: cross-env E2E_ENV=.dev BROWSER_TYPE=mobile RESOLUTION=414x846 cypress run --browser chrome
